meanings.definition: In a manner related to the circulation of water or other liquid through pipes or radiators for heating purposes.
meanings.sent1: The heating system in the house works hydronically to keep us warm during winter.
meanings.sent2: The water flows hydronically through the pipes to distribute heat evenly.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous cat accidentally turned the hydronically heated floor into a water park.
meanings.sent4: Her words flowed hydronically, warming the hearts of everyone who listened.
meanings.sent5: The idea spread hydronically, reaching every corner of the community.

meanings.definition: Using water or other liquid as a medium for transferring heat.
meanings.sent1: The hydronically heated room felt cozy and comfortable.
meanings.sent2: The hydronically powered system efficiently transferred heat throughout the building.
meanings.sent3: The hydronically warmed soup was a hit at the potluck.
meanings.sent4: His smile was as hydronically warm as a cup of hot cocoa on a snowy day.
meanings.sent5: The hydronically charged atmosphere made the event even more enjoyable.
